tying yourself to a mast is perhaps the oldest written example of what psychologists call a commitment device .PERIOD 
a commitment device is a decision that you make with a cool head to bind yourself so that you don't do something regrettable when you have a hot head .PERIOD 
because there's two heads inside one person when you think about it .PERIOD

but resisting temptation is hard .PERIOD 
the other reason that it's difficult to resist temptation is because it's an unequal battle between the present self and the future self .PERIOD

it's in control .PERIOD it's in power right now .PERIOD
